医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭开无症状 COVID-19 感染的秘密：HLA-B*15:01 连接揭示研究人员描述了 COVID-19 公民科学研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-asymptomatic-COVID-19-infections-HLA-B1501-connection-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-asymptomatic-COVID-19-infections-HLA-B1501-connection-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a44ee7a-305d-40fd-9784-8eccd57be196 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 03:58:00 -0400 Unlocking the secrets of asymptomatic COVID-19 infections: HLA-B*15:01 connection revealed
便秘与认知能力下降之间的联系研究人员报告称，长期便秘的人认知能力恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-link- Between-constipation-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-link- Between-constipation-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba783b31-a706-4724-bc09-b5b53ac58d69 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 03:39:00 -0400 The link between constipation and cognitive decline
两个糖尿病队列中危险因素与肾脏事件之间的关系研究人员使用关联规则来评估普通糖尿病人群和工人糖尿病人群的慢性肾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-relationships- Between-risk-factors-and-kidney-events-in-two-diabetic-cohorts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/The-relationships- Between-risk-factors-and-kidney-events-in-two-diabetic-cohorts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=683ff663-cf0a-4a8f-b409-8146d0977c9d Tue, 25 Jul 2023 03:32:00 -0400 The relationships between risk factors and kidney events in two diabetic cohorts
文献计量分析揭示了阿尔茨海默病和肠道微生物组之间的研究趋势研究人员利用文献计量分析来研究肠道微生物组与阿尔茨海默病发病机制之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Bibliometric-analysis-reveals-research-trends-connecting-Alzheimers-disease-and-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Bibliometric-analysis-reveals-research-trends-connecting-Alzheimers-disease-and-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0101e36-6226-4d89-b77c-db39a39c60a5 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 03:19:00 -0400 Bibliometric analysis reveals research trends connecting Alzheimer's disease and the gut microbiome
研究人员揭示了胰岛素产生背后的生物学原理胰岛素的发现拯救了全世界数百万糖尿病患者的生命，但人们对胰岛素合成的第一步知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Researchers-uncover-the-biology-behind-insulin-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Researchers-uncover-the-biology-behind-insulin-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f652a485-6fdf-4207-8c43-d7b7dff2c476 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 02:50:53 -0400 Researchers uncover the biology behind insulin production
通过临床测试的后期阶段推进新抗生素的开发昆士兰大学研究人员的一份报告警告称，尽管新抗生素的发展前景光明，但全球抗生素耐药性危机不可避免。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Advancing-new-antibiotics-through-the-later-stages-of-clinical-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Advancing-new-antibiotics-through-the-later-stages-of-clinical-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d0698b3-4621-46b7-8487-c2d90f354170 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 02:30:15 -0400 Advancing new antibiotics through the later stages of clinical testing
计算模型可改善膝关节置换手术期间的植入物对准德克萨斯农工大学的一名博士生与一家创新的手术导航和机器人公司合作进行运动捕捉研究，该研究可能会改善膝关节置换手术期间的植入物对准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Computational-modeling-to-improve-implant-alignment-during-knee-replacement-surgeries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Computational-modeling-to-improve-implant-alignment-during-knee-replacement-surgeries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cfcde90-944a-4509-9558-9360c4713eb5 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 02:09:57 -0400 Computational modeling to improve implant alignment during knee replacement surgeries
使用 EHR 描述美国各地儿科过敏的模式在此类最大规模的研究中，费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 的研究人员使用来自超过 200,000 名儿科患者的电子健康记录 (EHR) 数据来描述全美儿科过敏模式，验证了一种被称为“过敏行军”的人群水平过敏发展模式，其中过敏首先表现为湿疹，随后是食物过敏、哮喘和环境过敏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Description-patterns-of-pediatric-allergies-across-the-United-States-using-EHR.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Describing-patterns-of-pediatric-allergies-across-the-United-States-using-EHR.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d34bb7f-9f6c-41e2-81c4-7a50e8264000 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 01:56:03 -0400 Describing patterns of pediatric allergies across the United States using EHR
设计疫苗以诱导对感染病原体更强的免疫反应牛津大学出版社在《生物学方法与实验方案》上发表的一篇新论文表明，设计出疫苗来诱导对感染病原体（例如引起 COVID-19 的病毒）产生更强的免疫反应是可能的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Designing-vaccines-to-induce-a-stronger-immune-response-to-infecting-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Designing-vaccines-to-induce-a-stronger-immune-response-to-infecting-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee93ebf6-e166-4d7b-a1eb-f1cd11126dd6 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 01:54:45 -0400 Designing vaccines to induce a stronger immune response to infecting pathogens
AXT 和 CELLINK 建立强大的澳大利亚生物打印合作伙伴关系随着技术的不断发展，3D 生物打印正在经历快速增长。澳大利亚和 AXT 的情况确实如此，他们在该领域已经根深蒂固，很高兴地宣布他们将通过与 CELLINK 合作来巩固自己的地位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/AXT-and-CELLINK-Form-a-Formidable-Australian-Bioprinting-Partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/AXT-and-CELLINK-Form-a-Formidable-Australian-Bioprinting-Partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42f9d294-5565-4e5b-8380-ee08f59faa9f Tue, 25 Jul 2023 01:46:00 -0400 AXT and CELLINK Form a Formidable Australian Bioprinting Partnership
